version.intention: Create broad and generic general use concept as starting place for research teams and for use in calculating comorbidity indices.
version.provenance:
Selected parent OMOP SNOMED-CT condition (standard codes only),
Exclude concept ids that were identified as not mild liver disease,
update after informatics reviews, update with feedback from Clinician.
updated review by clinician. fine turn based on v6
